UTM D.I.A.N.A
-------------

**JOHOR BAHRU, 13 February**Â â€“ When you visit Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM), chances are, D.I.A.N.A will greet you with â€œHello sir, may I help you?â€ UTM membangunkan pembantu maya dalam bentuk avatar hologram pintar yang beroperasi dalam masa nyata (real time) dikenali sebagai D.I.A.N.A. D.I.A.N.A bermaksud â€˜Digital Security and Social Intelligent Assistantâ€™ (Pembantu Pintar Sosial dan Keselamatan Digital).

Introducing D.I.A.N.A â€“ UTMâ€™s Intelligent Hologram Avatar
---------------------------------------------------------

D.I.A.N.A is UTMâ€™s real time-hologram avatar, programmed and trained as a virtual assistant. D.I.A.N.A was first showcased at UTM Research Open Day on 6th February 2023, during the visit by the Minister of Higher Education, YB Datuk Seri Mohamed Khaled Nordin.

##### Meet & Greet with Industries

This session is specifically designed to foster connections between industry leaders and our academic community, with a focus on promoting our dynamic undergraduate programs and exploring collaborative opportunities.

##### Our organization

Welcome to the Faculty of Computing Research & Innovation â€“ [organization chart](https://comp.utm.my/research/about/organization/)
.

Our Research Group
==================

[![](https://comp.utm.my/rgname/wp-content/uploads/sites/2666/2024/08/alias-logo-bg.png)](https://comp.utm.my/alias/)

#### [Applied Industrial Analytics Research Group](https://comp.utm.my/alias/)

The Applied Industrial Analytics Research Group is created to serve as a platform for collaboration between industry and researchers from higher education institution.Â 

[![](https://comp.utm.my/rgname/wp-content/uploads/sites/2666/2024/08/vicube-logo-bg.png)](https://vicubelab.utm.my/)

#### [UTM ViCubeLab](https://vicubelab.utm.my/)

Virtual, Vision and Visualization Research Lab (UTM ViCubeLab) is a cross-disciplinary research group in computing whose primary focus is in computer graphics, vision and virtual environment, simulation and immersive visualization theories.

[![](https://comp.utm.my/rgname/wp-content/uploads/sites/2666/2024/08/iasrg-logo-bg.png)](https://comp.utm.my/iasrg/)

#### [Information Assurance and Security](https://comp.utm.my/iasrg/)

We are dedicated to exchanging and sharing our expertise from basic cybersecurity implementation to complex topics like Blockchain security and Artificial Intelligence based threats.

[![](https://comp.utm.my/rgname/wp-content/uploads/sites/2666/2024/08/iirg-logo-bg.png)](https://comp.utm.my/iirg/)

#### [Intelligent informatics Research Group](https://comp.utm.my/iirg/)

Intelligent informatics is an interdisciplinary field. Key research areas within intelligent informatics include Artificial Intelligence, machine learning, deep learning, cognitive computing, soft computing, and more.

![](https://comp.utm.my/rgname/wp-content/uploads/sites/2666/2024/08/serg-logo-bg.png)

#### Software Engineering Research Group

SERG is actively involved in research efforts that aims to improve the techniques, methods, processes and tools for development and maintenance of large and complex software systems.Â 

![](https://comp.utm.my/research/wp-content/uploads/sites/2666/2024/09/logo-pcrg.png)

#### Pervasive Computing Research Group (PCRG)

Pervasive Computing Research Group (PCRG) focuses on research and development in the field of Pervasive Computing (PC).Â  This computing approach is an emerging field, and it promotes new paradigms for computing models in the 21st century.Â Â 

![](https://comp.utm.my/research/wp-content/uploads/sites/2666/2024/07/UTM-and-AEIC.jpg)
